3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers\rest;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\orm\DAO;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\http\URequest;
8 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\ValidatorsManager;
9 use Ubiquity\contents\validation\validators\ConstraintViolation;
10 use Ubiquity\orm\OrmUtils;
11 use Ubiquity\orm\parser\Reflexion;
12 
25 class RestControllerUtilitiesTrait {
26  protected $errors;
27 
28  abstract public function _setResponseCode($value);
29 
30  protected function getDatas() {
31  return URequest::getDatas ();
32  }
33 
40  protected function getRequestParam($param, $default) {
41  if (isset ( $_GET [$param] )) {
42  return $_GET [$param];
43  }
44  return $default;
45  }
46 
47  protected function operate_($instance, $callback, $status, $exceptionMessage, $keyValues) {
48  if (isset ( $instance )) {
49  $result = $callback ( $instance );
50  if ($result == true) {
51  $formatter = $this->_getResponseFormatter ();
52  echo $formatter->format ( [ "status" => $status,"data" => $formatter->cleanRestObject ( $instance ) ] );
53  } elseif ($result === null) {
54  $this->displayErrors ();
55  } else {
56  throw new \Exception ( $exceptionMessage );
57  }
58  } else {
59  $this->_setResponseCode ( 404 );
60  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->format ( [ "message" => "No result found","keyValues" => $keyValues ] );
61  }
62  }
63 
64  protected function generatePagination(&$filter, $pageNumber, $pageSize) {
65  $count = DAO::count ( $this->model, $filter );
66  $pagesCount = ceil ( $count / $pageSize );
67  $pages = [ 'self' => $pageNumber,'first' => 1,'last' => $pagesCount,'pageSize' => $pageSize ];
68  if ($pageNumber - 1 > 0) {
69  $pages ['prev'] = $pageNumber - 1;
70  }
71  if ($pageNumber + 1 <= $pagesCount) {
72  $pages ['next'] = $pageNumber + 1;
73  }
74  $offset = ($pageNumber - 1) * $pageSize;
75  $filter .= ' limit ' . $offset . ',' . $pageSize;
76  return $pages;
77  }
78 
79  protected function updateOperation($instance, $datas, $updateMany = false) {
80  return DAO::update ( $instance, $updateMany );
81  }
82 
83  protected function AddOperation($instance, $datas, $insertMany = false) {
84  return DAO::insert ( $instance, $insertMany );
85  }
86 
91  protected function _getResponseFormatter() {
92  if (! isset ( $this->responseFormatter )) {
93  $this->responseFormatter = $this->getResponseFormatter ();
94  }
95  return $this->responseFormatter;
96  }
97 
103  protected function getResponseFormatter(): ResponseFormatter {
104  return new ResponseFormatter ();
105  }
106 
107  protected function _getRestServer() {
108  if (! isset ( $this->server )) {
109  $this->server = $this->getRestServer ();
110  }
111  return $this->server;
112  }
113 
119  protected function getRestServer(): RestServer {
120  return new RestServer ( $this->config );
121  }
122 
123  protected function connectDb($config) {
124  $db = $config ["database"];
125  if ($db ["dbName"] !== "") {
126  DAO::connect ( $db ["type"], $db ["dbName"], $db ["serverName"] ?? '127.0.0.1', $db ["port"] ?? 3306, $db ["user"] ?? 'root', $db ["password"] ?? '', $db ["options"] ?? [ ], $db ["cache"] ?? false);
127  }
128  }
129 
137  protected function _setValuesToObject($instance, $values = null) {
138  if (URequest::isJSON ()) {
139  if(is_string($values)){
140  $values = \json_decode ( $values, true );
141  }
142  }
143  $className = \get_class ( $instance );
144  $fieldsInRelationForUpdate = OrmUtils::getFieldsInRelationsForUpdate_ ( $className );
145  $manyToOneRelations = $fieldsInRelationForUpdate ["manyToOne"];
146 
147  $members = array_keys ( $values );
148  OrmUtils::setFieldToMemberNames ( $members, $fieldsInRelationForUpdate ["relations"] );
149  URequest::setValuesToObject ( $instance, $values );
150  if ($manyToOneRelations) {
151  $this->updateManyToOne ( $manyToOneRelations, $members, $className, $instance, $values );
152  }
153  }
154 
155  protected function updateManyToOne($manyToOneRelations,$members,$className,$instance,$values){
156  foreach ( $manyToOneRelations as $member ) {
157  if (array_search($member, $members)!==false) {
158  $joinColumn=OrmUtils::getAnnotationInfoMember($className, "#joinColumn", $member);
159  if ($joinColumn) {
160  $fkClass=$joinColumn["className"];
161  $fkField=$joinColumn["name"];
162  if (isset($values[$fkField])) {
163  $fkObject=DAO::getOne($fkClass, $values["$fkField"]);
164  Reflexion::setMemberValue($instance, $member, $fkObject);
165  }
166  }
167  }
168  }
169  }
170 
176  protected function getInclude($include) {
177  if (! UString::isBooleanStr ( $include )) {
178  return explode ( ",", $include );
179  }
180  return UString::isBooleanTrue ( $include );
181  }
182 
183  protected function addError($code, $title, $detail = null, $source = null, $status = null) {
184  $this->errors [] = new RestError ( $code, $title, $detail, $source, $status );
185  }
186 
187  protected function hasErrors() {
188  return is_array ( $this->errors ) && sizeof ( $this->errors ) > 0;
189  }
190 
191  protected function displayErrors() {
192  if ($this->hasErrors ()) {
193  $status = 200;
194  $errors = [ ];
195  foreach ( $this->errors as $error ) {
196  $errors [] = $error->asArray ();
197  if ($error->getStatus () > $status) {
198  $status = $error->getStatus ();
199  }
200  }
201  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->format ( [ 'errors' => $errors ] );
202  $this->_setResponseCode ( $status );
203  return true;
204  }
205  return false;
206  }
207 
218  protected function getAssociatedMemberValues_($ids, $getDatas, $member, $include = false, $useCache = false, $multiple = true) {
219  $include = $this->getInclude ( $include );
220  $useCache = UString::isBooleanTrue ( $useCache );
221  $datas = $getDatas ( [ $this->model,$ids ], $member, $include, $useCache );
222  if ($multiple) {
223  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->get ( $datas );
224  } else {
225  echo $this->_getResponseFormatter ()->getOne ( $datas );
226  }
227  }
228 
229  public function _validateInstance($instance, $members) {
230  if ($this->useValidation) {
231  $isValid = true;
232  $violations = ValidatorsManager::validate ( $instance );
233  foreach ( $violations as $violation ) {
234  if (array_search ( $violation->getMember (), $members ) !== false) {
235  $this->addViolation ( $violation );
236  $isValid = false;
237  }
238  }
239  return $isValid;
240  }
241  return true;
242  }
243 
244  protected function addViolation(ConstraintViolation $violation) {
245  $this->addError ( 406, 'Validation error', $violation->getMessage (), $violation->getMember (), $violation->getValidatorType () );
246  }
247 
248  protected function getPrimaryKeysFromDatas($datas, $model) {
249  $pks = OrmUtils::getKeyFields ( $model );
250  $result = [ ];
251  foreach ( $pks as $pk ) {
252  if (isset ( $datas [$pk] )) {
253  $result [] = $datas [$pk];
254  } else {
255  $this->addError ( 404, 'Primary key required', 'The primary key ' . $pk . ' is required!', $pk );
256  }
257  }
258  return $result;
259  }
260 
261  protected function getCondition($condition){
262  $condition=urldecode($condition);
263  if(strpos($condition, 'like')!==false){
264  $condition=str_replace('*', '%', $condition);
265  }
266  return $condition;
267  }
268 }
